TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlSchemaSearchPattern extends System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern

Docs.summary: Obtains the file locations of XML Schema documents for use in populating a Web services discovery document. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The XmlSchemaSearchPattern class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document. Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference GetDiscoveryReference(string filename) cil managed

Docs.param: The file system path of the XML Schema document.
Docs.summary: Returns the object for a given discovery document.
Docs.returns: A object that specifies the file name for an XML Schema document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.
A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference> instance contains the location of the .xsd file.

Docs.summary: Gets the file name pattern to use as a search target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The pattern "*.xsd" indicates an XML Schema document extension.
